title: Gibo no Toiki: Haitoku Kokoro ni Tadayou Haha no Iroka

alternative_titles.en: Do You Know the Milfing Man?
alternative_titles.ja: 義母の吐息 ～背徳心に漂う母の色香～

synopsis: When his mother dies and his father remarries, Kaito takes a shine to his sexy new stepmother, Sayoko. Driven mad with lust, Kaito is soon spying on her and sneaking into her bedroom for some covert late-night action. Though racked with guilt, Sayoko eventually finds herself a willing participant. And when Kaito tells her that his father is cheating on her with a younger woman, theirs becomes a full-fledged affair. The sex, sin and betrayal will turn Kaito's whole household upside down!
